message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product that I know will be valuable to your business. I've set the price at $1,000,000, which I believe is fair considering its worth to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am currently working within a budget of $800,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $800,000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I appreciate your offer, I can't go as low as $800,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will generate a strong return for your business.  I'm willing to come down to $900,000, which reflects the value I believe it brings to you. What do you think?

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $850,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests.
